name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
shortDescription: The world's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage of ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
eligibility: Families identified based on deprivation and occupational criteria from SECC 2011 database
All families included in the RSBY database that do not feature in the SECC database
No restriction on family size, age or gender
benefits: Cashless and paperless access to quality healthcare services
Coverage for 3 days pre-hospitalization and 15 days post-hospitalization expenses
No restrictions on family size, age or pre-existing conditions
All pre-existing diseases covered from day one
Coverage for 1,393 procedures including medical treatments, surgeries and day care procedures
applicationProcess: Check eligibility through PMJAY website (mera.pmjay.gov.in) or helpline (14555)
Visit nearest Ayushman Bharat empanelled hospital with valid ID proof
Verification through biometric authentication
Generate e-card at empanelled hospitals or Common Service Centres

english.name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
english.shortDescription: The world's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage of ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.

hindi.name: प्रधानमंत्री जन आरोग्य योजना (पीएम-जेएवाई)
hindi.shortDescription: विश्व की सबसे बड़ी स्वास्थ्य बीमा योजना जो माध्यमिक और तृतीयक अस्पताल में भर्ती के लिए प्रति परिवार प्रति वर्ष 5 लाख रुपये का कवरेज प्रदान करती है।

name: Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness Centres
shortDescription: Comprehensive primary healthcare through Health and Wellness Centers delivering an expanded range of services closer to communities.
eligibility: All citizens, regardless of income or social status
Focus on underserved and remote areas
benefits: Free essential drugs and diagnostic services
Maternal and child health services
Non-communicable disease management
Basic oral, ophthalmic, ENT care
Mental health services
First aid and emergency services
Yoga sessions and wellness activities
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Visit nearest Health and Wellness Centre with any identity document
Register for ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) for digital health records

english.name: Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness Centres
english.shortDescription: Comprehensive primary healthcare through Health and Wellness Centers delivering an expanded range of services closer to communities.

hindi.name: आयुष्मान भारत स्वास्थ्य और कल्याण केंद्र
hindi.shortDescription: स्वास्थ्य और कल्याण केंद्रों के माध्यम से व्यापक प्राथमिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल जो समुदायों के करीब सेवाओं की विस्तारित श्रृंखला प्रदान करती है।

name: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
shortDescription: Entitles all pregnant women delivering in public health institutions to absolutely free delivery including cesarean section and free transport.
coverage: Free delivery and post-natal care services
eligibility: All pregnant women delivering in public health facilities
All sick newborns accessing public health institutions for treatment up to 30 days after birth
No income criteria
benefits: Free delivery including cesarean section
Free drugs and consumables
Free diagnostics and blood transfusion if needed
Free diet during stay in the health institutions
Free transport from home to health institution, between facilities, and back home
Exemption from all user charges
applicationProcess: No formal application process
Visit nearest government health facility during pregnancy
Register for Antenatal Check-ups
All benefits provided at the time of delivery and post-delivery care

english.name: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
english.shortDescription: Entitles all pregnant women delivering in public health institutions to absolutely free delivery including cesarean section and free transport.

hindi.name: जननी शिशु सुरक्षा कार्यक्रम (जेएसएसके)
hindi.shortDescription: सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थानों में प्रसव कराने वाली सभी गर्भवती महिलाओं को सिजेरियन सेक्शन और मुफ्त परिवहन सहित पूरी तरह से मुफ्त प्रसव का अधिकार देता है।

name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
shortDescription: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for accidental death and disability for just ₹20 per year.
coverage: ₹2 lakh for accidental death and full disability; ₹1 lakh for partial disability
eligibility: All Indian citizens aged 18-70 years with a bank account
Must opt for auto-debit facility
benefits: Coverage for accidental death and disability
Low premium of just ₹20 per annum
Auto-renewal option available
Simple claims process
applicationProcess: Visit any bank branch or post office
Fill up the enrollment form
Submit with annual premium of ₹20
Link bank account for auto-debit facility

english.name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
english.shortDescription: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for accidental death and disability for just ₹20 per year.

hindi.name: प्रधानमंत्री सुरक्षा बीमा योजना (पीएमएसबीवाई)
hindi.shortDescription: महज ₹20 प्रति वर्ष में दुर्घटना मृत्यु और विकलांगता के लिए कवरेज प्रदान करने वाली दुर्घटना बीमा योजना।

name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
shortDescription: Life insurance scheme offering a renewable one-year term life cover of ₹2 lakh to all subscribing bank account holders for a premium of ₹330 per annum.
coverage: ₹2 lakh in case of death due to any reason
eligibility: All Indian citizens aged 18-50 years with a bank account
Must opt for auto-debit facility
benefits: Life coverage of ₹2 lakh in case of death due to any reason
Low premium of ₹330 per annum
Auto-renewal option available
Simple documentation for claims
applicationProcess: Visit any bank branch or post office
Fill up the enrollment form
Submit with annual premium of ₹330
Link bank account for auto-debit facility

english.name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
english.shortDescription: Life insurance scheme offering a renewable one-year term life cover of ₹2 lakh to all subscribing bank account holders for a premium of ₹330 per annum.

hindi.name: प्रधानमंत्री जीवन ज्योति बीमा योजना (पीएमजेजेबीवाई)
hindi.shortDescription: जीवन बीमा योजना जो ₹330 प्रति वर्ष के प्रीमियम के लिए सभी ग्राहक बैंक खाताधारकों को ₹2 लाख का नवीकरणीय एक वर्ष का जीवन कवर प्रदान करती है।

name: Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
shortDescription: Child health screening and early intervention services for children from birth to 18 years covering 4Ds - Defects, Diseases, Deficiencies and Developmental delays.
coverage: Comprehensive healthcare for children from birth to 18 years
eligibility: All children from birth to 18 years
Focus on early detection and intervention for childhood diseases
No income criteria
benefits: Screening for 30+ health conditions organized under 4Ds: Defects at birth, Diseases, Deficiencies, and Developmental delays including disabilities
Free treatment including surgery for health conditions covered under the program
Follow-up treatment and management
Referral support and treatment at tertiary level
applicationProcess: No formal application process
Screening conducted at birth sites, anganwadis, and government schools
Mobile health teams visit communities for screening
Treatment provided through District Early Intervention Centers

english.name: Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
english.shortDescription: Child health screening and early intervention services for children from birth to 18 years covering 4Ds - Defects, Diseases, Deficiencies and Developmental delays.

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय बाल स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रम (आरबीएसके)
hindi.shortDescription: जन्म से 18 वर्ष तक के बच्चों के लिए बाल स्वास्थ्य जांच और प्रारंभिक हस्तक्षेप सेवाएं जो 4डी - दोष, बीमारियां, कमियां और विकासात्मक देरी को कवर करती हैं।

name: National Programme for Prevention and Control of Cancer, Diabetes, Cardiovascular Diseases and Stroke (NPCDCS)
shortDescription: Prevents and controls major NCDs through health promotion, early diagnosis, management and referral to higher healthcare facilities.
coverage: Prevention, screening and management services for non-communicable diseases
eligibility: All citizens, particularly those above 30 years of age
Special focus on early screening and prevention
No income criteria
benefits: Free screening for common NCDs including diabetes, hypertension and common cancers
Timely diagnosis and referral to higher facilities for specialized treatment
Health promotion activities for behavior change
Access to NCD Clinics at Community Health Centers and District Hospitals
Home-based care for elderly and disabled
Palliative care services
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Visit nearest health facility (Sub-center, Primary Health Center, or NCD clinic)
Undergo screening for hypertension, diabetes, oral cancer, breast cancer and cervical cancer

english.name: National Programme for Prevention and Control of Cancer, Diabetes, Cardiovascular Diseases and Stroke (NPCDCS)
english.shortDescription: Prevents and controls major NCDs through health promotion, early diagnosis, management and referral to higher healthcare facilities.

hindi.name: कैंसर, मधुमेह, हृदय रोग और स्ट्रोक की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए राष्ट्रीय कार्यक्रम (एनपीसीडीसीएस)
hindi.shortDescription: स्वास्थ्य संवर्धन, प्रारंभिक निदान, प्रबंधन और उच्च स्वास्थ्य सुविधाओं के लिए रेफरल के माध्यम से प्रमुख एनसीडी को रोकता है और नियंत्रित करता है।

name: National Mental Health Programme (NMHP)
shortDescription: Aims to ensure the availability and accessibility of minimum mental healthcare for all, particularly the vulnerable and underprivileged sections of the population.
coverage: Prevention, treatment and rehabilitation services for mental disorders
eligibility: All citizens requiring mental health services
Special focus on vulnerable and underprivileged population
No income criteria
benefits: Free treatment for mental health disorders at government facilities
Integration of mental health with primary healthcare
Early detection and treatment of mental disorders
Rehabilitation services for persons with mental illness
Promotion of positive mental health through IEC activities
Free essential psychiatric drugs
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Visit nearest health facility or District Mental Health Programme center
Mental health services provided at various levels from primary to tertiary care

english.name: National Mental Health Programme (NMHP)
english.shortDescription: Aims to ensure the availability and accessibility of minimum mental healthcare for all, particularly the vulnerable and underprivileged sections of the population.

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय मानसिक स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रम (एनएमएचपी)
hindi.shortDescription: सभी के लिए, विशेष रूप से जनसंख्या के कमजोर और वंचित वर्गों के लिए न्यूनतम मानसिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल की उपलब्धता और पहुंच सुनिश्चित करने का लक्ष्य रखता है।

name: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY)
shortDescription: Health insurance scheme for BPL families providing cashless insurance for hospitalization in public and private hospitals.
coverage: ₹30,000 per family per annum for hospitalization expenses
eligibility: Below Poverty Line (BPL) families as per state BPL list
Unorganized sector workers: building and construction workers, street vendors, beedi workers, domestic workers, etc.
MGNREGA workers who have worked for more than 15 days during the preceding financial year
benefits: Cashless insurance for hospitalization
Coverage up to ₹30,000 per family per annum
Transportation allowance of ₹100 per hospitalization with maximum of ₹1,000 per year
Coverage for most diseases requiring hospitalization
Pre-existing conditions covered from day one
Access to both public and private hospitals
applicationProcess: Check name in the BPL list at local government offices
Attend enrollment station during enrollment drive with required documents
Pay ₹30 as registration fee and receive smart card
Renewal is required annually

english.name: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY)
english.shortDescription: Health insurance scheme for BPL families providing cashless insurance for hospitalization in public and private hospitals.

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य बीमा योजना (आरएसबीवाई)
hindi.shortDescription: बीपीएल परिवारों के लिए स्वास्थ्य बीमा योजना जो सार्वजनिक और निजी अस्पतालों में अस्पताल में भर्ती के लिए कैशलेस बीमा प्रदान करती है।

name: Nikshay Poshan Yojana (NPY)
shortDescription: Provides nutritional support to TB patients through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) of ₹500 per month for the duration of TB treatment.
coverage: ₹500 per month nutritional support during TB treatment
eligibility: All TB patients notified on or after 1st April 2018
Both public and privately treated patients
Patient must be notified in the Nikshay portal
Must have bank account and Aadhaar card (with exceptions for certain states)
benefits: Direct Benefit Transfer of ₹500 per month for nutritional support
Incentive continues throughout the treatment duration (6-8 months for drug-sensitive TB, 24 months for drug-resistant TB)
Payment made directly to patient's bank account
Additional support under TB Harega Desh Jeetega campaign
applicationProcess: Get diagnosed and notified as TB patient by healthcare provider
Healthcare provider or TB Health Visitor will register patient in Nikshay portal
Provide bank account details and Aadhaar number to the healthcare provider
Benefits transferred directly to bank account

english.name: Nikshay Poshan Yojana (NPY)
english.shortDescription: Provides nutritional support to TB patients through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) of ₹500 per month for the duration of TB treatment.

hindi.name: निक्षय पोषण योजना (एनपीवाई)
hindi.shortDescription: टीबी उपचार की अवधि के लिए प्रति माह ₹500 के प्रत्यक्ष लाभ अंतरण (डीबीटी) के माध्यम से टीबी रोगियों को पोषण संबंधी सहायता प्रदान करता है।

name: National Vector Borne Disease Control Programme (NVBDCP)
shortDescription: Prevents and controls vector-borne diseases such as Malaria, Dengue, Chikungunya, Japanese Encephalitis, Kala-azar and Lymphatic Filariasis.
coverage: Prevention, diagnosis and treatment of vector-borne diseases
eligibility: All citizens at risk of vector-borne diseases
Special focus on high endemic areas
No income criteria
benefits: Free diagnosis and treatment for vector-borne diseases at public health facilities
Vector control measures such as indoor residual spraying, distribution of insecticide-treated bed nets
Early detection and prompt treatment of cases
Mass drug administration for prevention of lymphatic filariasis
Awareness campaigns for prevention of vector-borne diseases
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Visit nearest health facility for diagnosis and treatment
Participate in community level prevention activities

english.name: National Vector Borne Disease Control Programme (NVBDCP)
english.shortDescription: Prevents and controls vector-borne diseases such as Malaria, Dengue, Chikungunya, Japanese Encephalitis, Kala-azar and Lymphatic Filariasis.

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय वेक्टर जनित रोग नियंत्रण कार्यक्रम (एनवीबीडीसीपी)
hindi.shortDescription: मलेरिया, डेंगू, चिकनगुनिया, जापानी इंसेफेलाइटिस, काला-अजार और लिम्फैटिक फाइलेरिएसिस जैसे वेक्टर जनित रोगों को रोकता और नियंत्रित करता है।
